Klao (nke enwere ike ikpọkwa Klaoh), maọbụKru, bụ asụsụ Kru nke Ezinaụlọ asụsụ Niger-Congo, nke a na-asụkarị na Liberia, na ụfọdụ ndị na-asụrụ ya na Sierra Leone, Ghana na Guinea
Ọ na-eji usoro okwu SVO maka ahịrịokwu ndị bụ isi na SOV maka ahịrị okwu agbakwunyere
E wepụtara nsụgharị Klao nke Bible site n'aka onye ozi ala ọzọ Nancy Lightfoot n'afọ 2000. Asụsụ ahụ nwere asụsụ ọdịda anyanwụ, ọdịda anyanwụ etiti, etiti, na ọwụwa anyanwụ.
